title: SotN #34: Polygon: Ethereum's Internet of Blockchains – Mihailo Bjelic & Sandeep Nailwal
description:
Guests:
Mihailo Benjic & Sandeep Nailwal

We bring Mihailo & Sandeep of Polygon (formerly Matic) to the Bankless State of The Nation, to discuss Ethereum's Internet of Blockchains and Polygon's approach to connecting networks.
